info.title: Supplier List for Sourcing - Read
info.description: This service enables you to read supplier list for sourcing in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service includes the header, business partners or suppliers, material groups, and company codes. The information is sent in the request as a payload. All information is utilized when creating a supplier list for sourcing with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Read supplier list for sourcing in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous service
